reviewText: The DVD played 20 or so minutes of the show... suddenly picture frozen.  Tried in multiple machines and computers dies out the same spot and will not progress.  The worst purchase I have made in a very long time.  Lesson well learned, a seller I will avoid in the future.  Still trying to complete the Yahoo Serious collection since this was a junk DVD.  The last time I had a DVD that did this was  several years ago, found out later , it was a rip or pirated...
